question: What part of the barbed wire is the twig pulled from?
options: The end of the barbed wire is where the twig is pulled from.

The sharp tip of the barbed wire is where the twig is extracted.
The middle part of the barbed wire is the twig pulled from.
The outermost loop of the barbed wire is where the twig was taken.
